name: Datadog
description: This plugin supports the ingestion of Alerts (DLP, Malware, Policy, Compromised Credential, Malsite, Quarantine, Remediation, Security Assessment, Watchlist, UBA, and CTEP), Events (Page, Application, Audit, Infrastructure, Network, Incident, and Endpoint), WebTx (Compressed), and Logs (Debug, Information, Error, and Warning) into the Datadog platform. It supports the ingestion of logs in both JSON and CEF formats.

configuration.label: Datadog Site
configuration.description: The site associated with your Datadog account. For example: datadoghq.com.

configuration.label: API Key
configuration.description: An API Key is required by the Datadog Agent to submit metrics and events to Datadog. Provide the Datadog API Key from 'Organization Settings > Access > API Keys' on the Datadog platform.

configuration.label: Datadog Tags
configuration.description: Tags associated with your logs. To add multiple tags, provide them as comma-separated values. For example: env:prod,region:us-east-1
